title: Casa Grande Ruins National Monument: Scientific Method
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun     Fun Facts     Scientific Method                  The Scientific Method          The world is full of questions. What causes volcanoes to form? Why does it rain? The scientific method was developed to provide an unbiased way of finding the best possible answer to a question. The scientific method was developed so scientists could test possible explanations to questions, and allow others to verify the results. There are five general steps when applying the scientific method:  Make observations Ask a question based on observations Form several hypotheses Test the hypotheses Make a conclusion      Back - Next
